duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service and support to clients in a professional manner.
Effectively communicate with customers through verbal and written channels, resolving issues and answering inquiries.
Navigate multiple platforms and dual screens while engaging in phone conversations with customers.
Manage a quiet and distraction-free work environment to ensure high-quality customer interactions.
Follow company guidelines and procedures to meet customer service objectives.
Complete note-taking and documentation during customer interactions to capture relevant information.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
